# Cosmic Canvas: A Reflection of God's Majesty
## Scripture
> "The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands." - Psalm 19:1

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the starry night sky, we are reminded of the breathtaking beauty and vastness of God's creation. The celestial bodies, with their intricate patterns and majestic movements, serve as a cosmic canvas, showcasing the glory of God. Just as an artist's brushstrokes reveal their skill and character, the universe reveals the craftsmanship and majesty of our Creator. The harmony and balance in the universe demonstrate God's sovereign control over all creation, from the largest galaxies to the smallest subatomic particles.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the wonders of the night sky, we are filled with awe and reverence for Your majesty. Help us to see Your handiwork in every star, planet, and galaxy, and to recognize Your sovereign control over all creation. May our gaze upon the cosmic canvas inspire us to worship and praise You, and may we reflect Your glory to a world in need of Your light. Thank You for the beauty and vastness of Your creation, and for the love that You have shown us through Jesus Christ. Amen.
